Announcements   
 
Announcement 1:  
Mathematics Exams Postponed:  The mathematics exams scheduled for next week have been 
postponed to the following week. The new date will be communicated soon. Please encourage 
your children to continue their preparations.  
 
Announcement 2:  
Science Project Deadline Extended:  The deadline for the science project has been extended 
by one week. The new submission date is now Friday, July 12th. This extension will allow 
students more time to complete their projects thoroughly.  
 
Announcement 3:  
Reading Assignment Reminder:  A reminder that the reading assignment for Language Arts is 
due this Friday. Students should ensure they have read the assigned chapters and completed 
the accompanying worksheet.  
 
Announcement 4:  
Field Trip Permission Slips:  Please return the signed permission slips for the upcoming field 
trip to the museum by Monday, July 1st. This will help us finalize our arrangements.  
 
Announcement 5:

trip to the museum by Monday, July 1st. This will help us finalize our arrangements.  
 
Announcement 5:  
Parent -Teacher Conferences:  Parent -teacher conferences will be held next month. Sign -up 
sheets will be available online starting next week. We encourage you to book a slot to discuss 
your child’s progress.

Additional Notes
Parent-T eacher Conferences:  Scheduled twice a year . Specific dates will be communicated via email and the
school website.
Appointment Requests:  For meetings outside of of fice hours, please email the teacher to arrange an
appointment.
Communication Policy:  Teachers will respond to emails within 24 hours during weekdays. For urgent matters,
please call the school of fice.

General

Regulations
 
for
 
School

and
 
Punctuality
○
Students
 
must
 
attend
 
school
 
daily
 
and
 
arrive
 
on
 
time.
○
Parents
 
should

absences

Code
○
Students
 
must
 
wear

prescribed
 
school
 
uniform.
○
Clothing
 
should
 
be
 
neat,
 
clean,
 
and
 
appropriate
 
for
 
school
 
activities.
3.

and
 
Discipline
○
Students
 
must
 
show
 
respect
 
to

staff,
 
and
 
fellow

○

harassment,
 
and
 
any

prohibited.
○

classroom
 
rules
 
and

Assignment Name Teacher Name Due Date Subject Description
Math Homework Mr. Johnson 18-Jul-24 Mathematics Complete exercises 1 to 20 from Chapter 5.
History Essay Mrs. Thompson 20-Jul-24 History Write a 1500-word essay on the French Revolution.
Science Project Dr. Patel 22-Jul-24 Science Create a model of the solar system.
Literature Review Ms. Adams 25-Jul-24 Literature Review and analyze three poems by Robert Frost.
Computer Science Lab Mr. Garcia 28-Jul-24 Computer Science Develop a simple calculator application.
Art Assignment Ms. Lee 30-Jul-24 Art Create a landscape painting using watercolors.
Economics Report Mr. Brown 1-Aug-24 Economics Analyze the impact of globalization on local economies.
Geography Quiz Mrs. Davis 3-Aug-24 Geography Study chapters 7 and 8 for the upcoming quiz.
Chemistry Experiment Dr. White 5-Aug-24 Chemistry Conduct an experiment on chemical reactions.
Music Composition Mr. Black 7-Aug-24 Music Compose a short piece of music using a piano.
